seo.title: Brand
seo.description: Esplora la tradizione italiana dell'arredamento di qualit√† con Pacelli Arredamenti. Con oltre 50 anni di esperienza, collaboriamo con oltre 50 brand di eccellenza, offrendo una vasta gamma di prodotti

description: Discover the best furniture brands in our showroom: quality, innovation and creativity at your disposal

hero.title: Our partners are only the best furniture brands
hero.description: We are proud to say that the companies we supply are considered the best in the furniture market. Companies oriented towards the search for modern and creative solutions and attentive to changes in home living and furnishings. The furniture market is known for its continuous innovation and evolution. To stay on top of the latest trends and technologies, it's essential to work with cutting-edge companies. We are happy to be suppliers of leading companies in the furniture sector, characterized by the constant search for innovative and creative solutions for domestic and non-domestic furnishings. Quality, innovation, reliability and collaboration are the pillars of our relationship with these exceptional partners. In a sector where quality is fundamental to improving the daily lives of consumers, the companies we serve never compromise on this aspect, continuing to offer the highest quality standards
